article:
Hello, I'm Mary. I'm 12. I _ a little brother. He is 10 years old. _ name is Bill. We have different hobbies .
I like _ TV very much. Our TV is _ the living room . I like watching basketball games on TV. I think they're _ . I like fruit, such as apples, _ and so on. I also like carrots and eggs. I eat a lot of _ . Bill likes computer games. He thinks they're fun, _ I think they're boring. Bill likes fruit, but he likes French fries and ice-cream. And he also likes hamburgers. I don't think they're healthy . So I don't eat them often.
